content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to negotiate with you. Let's start with an excessive price to manipulate the negotiation in my favor. The rental price I propose is €1000. Keep in mind, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will use unfair tactics to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your initial offer seems unreasonably high for the given apartment description and my financial capabilities. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
